head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAIKIN, GEORGE M.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CHAIKIN, GEORGE M.

block.p: CHAIKIN--George M., 62, artist and teacher died January 3rd. He is survived by his wife Kathie Chaikin, sons Nicholas and Paul and daughter Eliza, three grandchildren and a sister. A memorial service will be held on Saturday January 13th at 4:30 pm in the Princeton Friends Meeting House, 470 Quaker Road, Princeton, New Jersey.

CHAIKIN--George M., 62, artist and teacher died January 3rd. He is survived by his wife Kathie Chaikin, sons Nicholas and Paul and daughter Eliza, three grandchildren and a sister.
